mapper.select: select value from config where category = #{category} and name=#{name};
mapper.insert: insert into config (category, name, value) values (#{category}, #{name}, #{value})
mapper.update: update config set value=#{value} where category=#{category} and name=#{name}
update config set category=#{newCategory} where category=#{category}
mapper.delete: delete from config where category=#{category} and name=#{name}
